description.translate: Of a quasi-imperceptible superiority, it exacerbates from soma to the obstinacy of its carrier.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Toute-puissante Thoréën\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7D'une supériorité quasi-imperceptible, elle exacerbe\"}","{\"text\":\"§7du soma jusqu'à l'obstination de son porteur.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Of a quasi-imperceptible superiority, it exacerbates\"}","{\"text\":\"§7from soma to the obstinacy of its carrier.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7HAS§a2 §7HER§a1\"}"]}}
